  • @ProviderType
public interface AssetDownloadHelper

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxContentSizeLimit

        long getMaxContentSizeLimit()
        Returns:
        the max size in bytes that the AEM AssetDownloadServlet allows to be downloaded at once.

      • getAssetDownloadSize

        long getAssetDownloadSize​(Collection<AssetModel> assets,
                          org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource configResource)
        Computes the size of the assets requested to be downloaded. Note that this only computes the size of the ORIGINAL renditions.
        Parameters:
        assets - the assets to compute the size of.
        configResource - the resource
        Returns:
        size of the assets.
